attributes.action: Set up an external audit for the banking sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of recent blunder's in the us with British financial instituitions investing in the sub prime market,it's about time that the government retain some control on the finance sector. Obviously current measures in the Bank of England and the FSA are not working, and the only way to stop bank's investing our money badly, and tipping us into recession is for the government to set standards and audit our banks. This is something the banks do not want!
